subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The spotlight has shifted to General Manager Brian Cashman with Mark Teixeira on the 15-day disabled list and Kevin Youkilis missing the next 10 to 12 weeks because of surgery.
snippet: The spotlight has shifted to General Manager Brian Cashman with Mark Teixeira on the 15-day disabled list and Kevin Youkilis missing the next 10 to 12 weeks because of surgery.
